Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: goctl
Description: A cli tool to generate go-zero code

Arguments.Name: --branch
Arguments.Description: The branch of the remote repo, it does work with --remote

Arguments.Name: --home
Arguments.Description: The goctl home path of the template, --home and --remote cannot be set at the same time, if they are, --remote has higher priority

Arguments.Name: --remote
Arguments.Description: The remote git repo of the template, --home and --remote cannot be set at the same time, if they are, --remote has higher priority 	The git repo directory must be consistent with the https://github.com/zeromicro/go-zero-template directory structure

Arguments.Name: dart
Arguments.Description: Generate dart files for provided api in api file

Arguments.Name: --declare
Arguments.Description: Use to skip check api types already declare

Arguments.Name: --stdin
Arguments.Description: Use stdin to input api doc content, press "ctrl + d" to send EOF
